argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The name of the table as it appears in the Control Panel.

page.description: Get the physical (master) filename of the table, if name specified, returns full path to provided database name.
page.discussion: The TABLE.ACTUAL_FILENAME_GET() method returns the real filename (as opposed to the filename of the shadow table) of Table_Name. Table_Name is an entry in the Tables/Sets tab on the Control Panel.
